meanings.definition: A person who has paid to receive a publication or service regularly.
meanings.sent1: The magazine has many loyal subscribers who enjoy reading it every month.
meanings.sent2: The subscribers of the streaming service get access to exclusive content.
meanings.sent3: The subscribers to the cooking class were always hungry for new recipes.
meanings.sent4: She was a subscriber to the idea of trying new hobbies to enrich her life.
meanings.sent5: The subscribers eagerly awaited the next issue, eager to dive into its contents.

meanings.definition: A person who signs or agrees to a document, contract, or service.
meanings.sent1: The new subscribers to the gym membership were excited to start their fitness journey.
meanings.sent2: The subscribers to the lease agreement were responsible for paying rent on time.
meanings.sent3: The subscribers to the charity pledge were happy to support a good cause.
meanings.sent4: He became a subscriber to the idea of teamwork after seeing its benefits.
meanings.sent5: The subscribers to the online course were committed to completing all the modules.
